com.netflix.genie.web.tasks.job

Class JobMonitoringCoordinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.web.services.impl.JobStateServiceImpl
      • com.netflix.genie.web.tasks.job.JobMonitoringCoordinator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobMetricsService, JobStateService

    @Component
 @Primary
public class JobMonitoringCoordinator
extends JobStateServiceImpl
    A Task to monitor running jobs on a Genie node.
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • JobMonitoringCoordinator

        @Autowired
public JobMonitoringCoordinator(GenieHostInfo genieHostInfo,
                                           JobSearchService jobSearchService,
                                           GenieEventBus genieEventBus,
                                           @Qualifier(value="genieTaskScheduler")
                                           org.springframework.scheduling.TaskScheduler scheduler,
                                           org.apache.commons.exec.Executor executor,
                                           io.micrometer.core.instrument.MeterRegistry registry,
                                           org.springframework.core.io.Resource jobsDir,
                                           JobsProperties jobsProperties,
                                           JobSubmitterService jobSubmitterService)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        genieHostInfo - Information about the host the Genie process is currently running on
        jobSearchService - The search service to use to find jobs
        genieEventBus - The Genie event bus to use for publishing events
        scheduler - The task scheduler to use to register scheduling of job checkers
        executor - The executor to use to launch processes
        registry - The metrics registry
        jobsDir - The directory where job output is stored
        jobsProperties - The properties pertaining to jobs
        jobSubmitterService - implementation of the job submitter service
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on error with the filesystem

    • Method Detail

      • onStartup

        @EventListener
public void onStartup(org.springframework.context.event.ContextRefreshedEvent event)
                              throws GenieException
        When this application is fully up and running this method should be triggered by an event. It will query the database to find any jobs already running on this node that aren't in the map. The use case for this is if the Genie application crashes when it comes back up it can find the jobs again and not leave them orphaned.
        Parameters:
        event - The spring ready event indicating the application is ready to start taking load
        Throws:
        GenieException - on unrecoverable error

      • onJobStarted

        @EventListener
public void onJobStarted(JobStartedEvent event)
        This event is fired when a job is started on this Genie node. Will create a JobMonitor and schedule it for monitoring.
        Parameters:
        event - The event of the started job

      • onJobFinished

        @EventListener
public void onJobFinished(JobFinishedEvent event)
                                  throws GenieException
        When a job is finished this event is fired. This method will cancel the task monitoring the job process.
        Parameters:
        event - the event of the finished job
        Throws:
        GenieException - When a job execution can't be found (should never happen)
